#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int n,x,i;
	long double r,f,a;
	cin>>n;
	r=0;x=0;
	char s[n+1];
	cin>>s;
	cin>>a>>f;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(s[i]=='R')
		r=r+a;
		if(s[i]=='L')
		r=r-a;
		if(r>f||r<(-1*f))
		{
			x=1;break;
		}
	}
	if(x==0)
	cout<<"YES\n";
	else
	cout<<"NO\n";
}
